div.p: Don't worry, the messages in will not be deleted.
Don't worry, the messages in will not be deleted.

div.t-att-class: 'message__summary gmail_unread' if mail.get('parent_id').msg_unread == False and mail.get('parent_id').author_id.id != user_id.partner_id.id else 'message__summary gmail_read'

a.t-attf-title: #{ starred and 'Move to Inbox' or 'Mark as Todo'}

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-star' if request.env.user.partner_id in mail.get('parent_id').starred_partner_ids else ''

a.t-attf-title: #{ done and 'Move to Inbox' or 'Mark as Done'}

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-lg fa-check gmail_mark_done' if mail.get('message_label') == 'done' else ''

div.t-att-class: 'message__summary gmail_unread' if mail.get('parent_id').msg_unread == False else 'message__summary gmail_read'

a.t-attf-title: #{ starred and 'Move to Inbox' or 'Mark as Todo'}

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-star' if request.env.user.partner_id in mail.get('parent_id').starred_partner_ids else ''

a.t-attf-title: #{ starred and 'Move to Inbox' or 'Mark as Todo'}

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-star' if request.env.user.partner_id in mail.get('parent_id').starred_partner_ids else 'fa fa-star-o'

a.t-attf-title: #{ done and 'Move to Inbox' or 'Mark as Done'}
#{ starred and 'Move to Inbox' or 'Mark as Todo'}

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-star' if request.env.user.partner_id in c_mail.starred_partner_ids else 'fa fa-star-o'

a.t-attf-title: #{ starred and 'Move to Inbox' or 'Mark as Todo'}

i.t-att-class: 'fa fa-star' if request.env.user.partner_id in mail.get('parent_id').starred_partner_ids else 'fa fa-star-o'

div.t-if: not today_messages and not yesterday_messages and not thismonth_messages and not more_messages

t.t-if: today_messages or yesterday_messages or thismonth_messages or more_messages

a.t-att-href: pager['page_next']['url'] if pager['page']['num'] != pager['page_count'] else None
